full_summary:
### Title: Main Service Garage Replacement Design - Riding Mountain National Park
#### Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0192/A
#### Publication Date: 2022-11-22

The Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites consulting firms to submit Proposals for the provision of professional design services, and prime consultant services for the replacement of the Main Service Garage in Riding Mountain National Park (RMNP). The scope of work includes investigation, planning, design, construction administration, and post-construction services.

A Bidders' Conference will be held via teleconference on November 30, 2022, at 11:00 AM CST. The conference will cover the scope of work and answer questions. Participation is recommended for all bidders.

The project timeline is outlined in Appendix D. Enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing, no later than eight business days prior to the closing date.

Requests for clarification or changes resulting from the Bidders' Conference will be included as an amendment to the Solicitation Document.

**Submission Guidelines:**
* Submissions via Fax and Email will be accepted as official.
* Bidders must submit their proposals via Fax (1-855-983-1808) or Email (soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
* Proposals submitted in-person or by Courier will not be accepted.
* The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes.

**Important Notice:**
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
